nodes.text: The Norat system was located in the Farlax sector, a part of the Negs portion of the Core Worlds. It was home to the sentient Norat species as well as the origin point of the government known as the Norat Sovereignty.
The Norat system was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square K-10.
